description: circular two-story building with windows and doors, a chimney in the center, and a ramp with a railing leading to a door on the second floor; to the right of the building is a cart with two wheels and a smaller building to the right of the cart
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.107 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: Privat-exemplar | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2243
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 16. | LL in pencil, below image: Ziegelofen.
title: Brick Kiln
